raiseHandPrompt: We have a question or comment from the audience, please invite a human speaker called [NAME] to the debate. After listening to the human, answer and engage deeper with their thoughts.
neverMindPrompt: It seems like [NAME] didn't want to speak after all, make an excuse for them and then invite the next speaker.
finalizeMeetingPrompt: Please summarise the meeting, held on [DATE], making a document that could work as a meeting protocol and a policy recommendation, that could be sent to a official political department like the European Comission.
